Bugs & Questions¶

You can file bugs in our github issues tracker, ask questions on our mailing list or on our gitter chat. Or check the FAQ section on the documentation.

Mailing list¶

https://groups.google.com/d/forum/passpie

Gitter¶

https://gitter.im/marcwebbie/passpie

Github issues¶

https://github.com/marcwebbie/passpie/issues

FAQ¶

http://passpie.readthedocs.org/en/latest/faq.html

Passpie

Passpie is a command-line password manager with a colorful interface.
